translations.translation: My Lord, rescue me and my family from what they are doing.'
(And prayed:) "O Lord, save me and my family from what they do."
My Lord, deliver me and my family from their wicked deeds."
Lord, save me and my family from their deeds."
“My Lord, rescue me and my family from their deeds.”
My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do."
My Lord! deliver me and my followers from what they do.
My Lord, deliver me and my people from that they do.'
My Lord! Save me and my household from what they do.
My Lord, save me and my family from their evil doings."
My Lord! deliver me and my household from that which they work.
‘My Lord! Deliver me and my family from what they do.’
O my Lord! deliver me and my family from such things as they do!"
My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do."
My Lord, save me and my people from that they are doing'
“My Lord, save me and my family from what they do.”
My Lord, save me and my family from [the consequence of] what they do."
[26:169] My Lord, deliver me and my family from what they do’, that is, from the punishment for it.
(My Lord! Save me and my household from what they do.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ توحه نحو الحق وناجى معه مبغضاً عليهم، مشتكياً إلى ربه بقوله: { رَبِّ } يا من رباني بأنواع الطهارة والنظافة الصورية والمعنيوة { نَّجِنِي } بفضلك وجودك { وَأَهْلِي مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ } [الشعراء: 169] أي: من العذاب الموعود النازل عليهم بشؤم عملهم هذا
